name: Sailor In The Desert
description:
The game is about a sailor who is purchasing products from camel drivers. It is because the sailor yearns to stay in Despina, so he needs money. It is a 3D environment puzzle game. The player will act as a sailor and find camel drivers around the Despina city. Then, the player needs to bring that product back to the dock and get paid.

Play instruction:

WASD to move

Space to jump

shirt+W to run faster

Info:

Game Made by Ho Chun Chan

From Lab01
